meta.title: LAB SEVEN Rental Pricing | Professional Battery Power Rentals
meta.description: Transparent LAB SEVEN rental pricing. All-inclusive rates with delivery, pickup, backup generator. Available through Labrador Field Systems.

hero.title: Rental pricing and options
hero.tagline: Transparent, all-inclusive rental pricing. Delivery, pickup, and backup generator included. No hidden fees, no fuel costs, no surprises.

items.title: Delivery and pickup included
items.description: White-glove service. We deliver, place, and pick up. You focus on production, not logistics.

items.title: Backup generator included
items.description: Every rental includes backup generator positioned away from sensitive areas. Peace of mind for extended shoots.

items.title: No hidden costs
items.description: No fuel charges, no fire watch fees, no permit costs. Transparent pricing includes everything you need.

problem.title: True cost of generator power
problem.intro: Generator rental rates hide the real costs of power on set

items.title: Day rate is just the start
items.description: Generator day rates ($400-800) don't include fuel ($100-200/day), delivery ($150-300), fire watch ($500+), permits ($200-500), or location fees for noise variances.

items.title: Extended wrap time
items.description: Generator shutdown, fuel cleanup, and equipment removal extend wrap by 1-2 hours, adding crew overtime costs.

items.title: Noise complaints cost time
items.description: Each noise complaint requires repositioning, adjustments, or negotiations. Lost production time translates to budget overruns.

items.title: Fuel logistics consume resources
items.description: Fuel runs, spillage cleanup, and refueling pauses pull crew attention away from production tasks.

items.title: One transparent rate
items.description: Contact Labrador Field Systems for current day rates and multi-day discounts. All-inclusive pricing covers delivery, placement, pickup, and backup generator.

items.title: Promo code 241
items.description: ONE FREE RENTAL DAY with promo code "241" on your first booking. Experience professional battery power at no cost.

items.title: No fuel, fire watch, or permits
items.description: Battery operation eliminates fuel costs, fire watch requirements, and noise permit fees. What you see is what you pay.

items.title: Faster setup and wrap
items.description: 5-minute power-on. No fuel management. Instant shutdown. Shorter production days reduce crew costs and location fees.

items.title: Multi-day discounts
items.description: Extended rental rates available for week-long shoots, multi-day events, and festival installations. Contact Labrador Field Systems for custom quotes.

items.title: Package deals available
items.description: Rent multiple units for larger productions. Battery rotation support for 24-hour operations. Custom power solutions for complex needs.

without.title: Traditional generator rental
without.description: Book generator 2 weeks out. Arrange fuel delivery. Secure permits and fire watch. Generator arrives day of shoot. 2-hour setup and inspection. Mid-day fuel run. Fire watch during lunch. 2-hour wrap for fuel drain and removal. Overtime costs for extended crew.

with.title: LAB SEVEN rental
with.description: Book battery. Battery delivered before crew call, placed by rental house. Powers on in 5 minutes. No fuel, no permits, no fire watch. Silent operation all day. Powers down when production wraps. Pickup scheduled for next morning. Crew goes home on time.

caseStudy.title: Real production cost comparison
content: Multi-day commercial shoot in historic downtown location. Production required quiet power for indoor and outdoor scenes.
Generator quote: $600/day + $150 delivery + $200/day fuel + $500/day fire watch + $300 noise permit = $1,750/day for 3 days = $5,250 total
LAB SEVEN rental: All-inclusive rate significantly lower than generator total costs. Zero complaints. Zero delays. Location approved for future shoots.
caseStudy.quote: Once we added up all the generator costs, battery rental was the obvious choice. Quieter set was just a bonus.

items.question: What's included in the rental rate?
items.answer: Delivery, placement, pickup, backup generator, technical support, and monitoring equipment. No hidden fees, no fuel charges, no fire watch costs.

items.question: Do you offer multi-day discounts?
items.answer: Yes. Week-long and multi-week rentals receive discounted rates. Contact Labrador Field Systems for custom quotes on extended productions.

items.question: What about promo code 241?
items.answer: First-time renters receive ONE FREE RENTAL DAY with promo code "241". Experience LAB SEVEN at no cost to evaluate for your production needs.

items.question: Can I rent multiple units?
items.answer: Yes. Package deals available for productions requiring multiple battery systems. Volume discounts for large events and festivals.

items.question: What if I need to extend my rental?
items.answer: Contact Labrador Field Systems during your rental to extend. Subject to availability. We'll work with your production schedule to keep you powered.

items.question: Is insurance included?
items.answer: Standard rental insurance terms apply. LFP chemistry is insurance-friendly and meets production insurance requirements. Check with your provider for specific coverage.

finalCta.title: Ready to book your rental?
finalCta.description: Contact Labrador Field Systems for current rates, availability, and promo code "241" for one free rental day.
